name: rss-feed-wrangler
description: AWS Lambda function to process Atom feeds and split descriptions

scripts.generate-hash: API_URL=$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name RssFeedWranglerStack --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`FeedEndpoint`].OutputValue' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo '') node --env-file-if-exists=.env.local --experimental-strip-types src/cli/generate-hash.ts
scripts.deploy: npm run build && CDK_DOCKER=0 cdk deploy
